original_text: Moses took the priest's clothes from Aaron and he put them on Eleazar. Then Aaron died there, at the top of the mountain. Moses and Eleazar walked back down the mountain.
korean_text: 모세가 아론의 옷을 벗겨 그의 아들 엘르아살에게 입히매 아론이 그 산 꼭대기에서 죽으니라 모세와 엘르아살이 산에서 내려오니

sentences.original_text: Moses took the priest's clothes from Aaron
and he put them on Eleazar
at the top of the mountain
Moses and Eleazar walked back down the mountain
